alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 30 at 1:00PM EDT until August 30 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... Irwin County in south central Georgia... Tift County in south central Georgia... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 100 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ocilla, Fitzgerald, Tifton, Omega, Mystic, Unionville, Phillipsburg, Pinetta, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Irwinville, Harding, Irwinville Airport, Abba, Ashton, Waterloo, Lulaville, Arp, Osierfield, Queensland and Brookfield. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
